title: FS- T206 Paul Davidson (Polar Bear) SGC 30 SOLD

posts.post_title: FS- T206 Paul Davidson (Polar Bear) SGC 30 SOLD
posts.post_content: Great card.  Tremendous eye appeal.  Possibly slight paper loss on left border brings it to this grade.  Crease free. $28.00 money order or paypal friends and family. Thanks.
